message: Let's start with a reasonable split. I get $6000, you get $4000.  The value decreases over time for me, so a quick agreement benefits us both.
Your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor. Let's meet closer to the middle while time still benefits both of us.
Time is money, Bob, especially for me!  This offer is a compromise, acknowledging the time pressure while still being a better deal for me than your last.
Alice, we're running out of time. This offer is my final compromise. It benefits you to take it now before inflation eats further into your share.
